title: Taye Atske Selassie - Wikipedia
snippet: Taye Atske Selassie Amde (Amharic: ታዬ አጽቀሥላሴ, born 13 January 1956) is an Ethiopian diplomat and politician who is the President of Ethiopia since 2024.

title: Taye Atske Selassie becomes Ethiopia's new president | TV BRICS, 08.10.24
snippet: Taye Atske Selassie was sworn in as President of the Federal Democratic Republic of Ethiopia at a joint parliamentary session of the country on 7 October 2024.

title: Taye Atske Selassie - X
snippet: Taye Atske Selassie · @TayeAtske · President of The Federal Democratic Republic of Ethiopia ; Former Foreign Minister, Ambassador and Permanent Representative of Ethiopia to the UN. Ethiopia Joined August 2014 · 543 Following · 287.3K Followers · Pinned · Taye Atske Selassie ·

title: Ambassador Taye Atske Selassie Appointed President of Ethiopia - ENA English - ENA
snippet: Addis Ababa October 7/2024 (ENA) - Ambassador Taye Atske Selassie, serving as Minister of Foreign Affairs has been appointed as president of Federal Democratic Republic of Ethiopia.

title: Eritrean Press on X: "Taye Atske Selassie has been appointed as Ethiopia’s new president, succeeding the country’s first female president, Sahle-Work Zewde. He has served as the Minister of Foreign Affairs since February 8, 2024. Born in Debarek, Gondar, Taye, who stands 5 ft. 4 in. tall, https://t.co/rlf4OigIUy" / X
